intro: Deinbollia gossweileri, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its rosette-shaped leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in well-drained conditions. It is popular as a houseplant due to its vibrant colors and compact size. Deinbollia gossweileri is also valued for its ability to bloom throughout the year under proper care.
